vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in DEP_BANK.Collect (0xaae1f51cf3339f18b6d3f3bdc75a5facd744b0b8.sol#41-53):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0xaae1f51cf3339f18b6d3f3bdc75a5facd744b0b8.sol#47-51)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (0xaae1f51cf3339f18b6d3f3bdc75a5facd744b0b8.sol#49)
